mapper.update: UPDATE fish_pet SET hunger = CASE WHEN level >= 30 THEN 100 ELSE GREATEST(0, hunger - #{hungerDecrement}) END, mood = CASE WHEN level >= 30 THEN 100 ELSE GREATEST(0, mood - #{moodDecrement}) END, updateTime = NOW() WHERE isDelete = 0
mapper.select: SELECT petId, userId, level FROM fish_pet WHERE isDelete = 0 AND (hunger > 0 OR mood > 0)

SELECT p.petId, p.name, p.petUrl, p.level, p.exp, p.userId, u.userName, u.userAvatar FROM fish_pet p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.userId = u.id WHERE p.isDelete = 0 AND u.isDelete = 0 ORDER BY p.level DESC, p.exp DESC LIMIT #{limit}
